evidence.text: God has never begotten a son, nor is there any god besides Him. Otherwise, each god would have taken away what it has created, and some of them would have gained supremacy over others. Glory be to God, far beyond what they describe.

parallel_ar.text: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٍۢ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ ۚ إِذًۭا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَٰهٍۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

evidence.text: He begets not, nor was He begotten.

parallel_ar.text: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ

evidence.text: If God wanted to have a son, He could have selected from His creation at will. Glory be to Him. He is God, the One, the Prevailing.

parallel_ar.text: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًۭا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ

claim_text: The Father has the Hyposthesis, which is a person.

evidence.text: And they say, "God has begotten a son." Be He glorified. Rather, His is everything in the heavens and the earth; all are obedient to Him.

parallel_ar.text: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدًۭا ۗ سُبْحَٰنَهُۥ ۖ بَل لَّهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ كُلٌّۭ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

evidence.text: We created the human being, and We know what his soul whispers to him. We are nearer to him than his jugular vein.

parallel_ar.text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ

evidence.text: If God wanted to have a son, He could have selected from His creation at will. Glory be to Him. He is God, the One, the Prevailing.

parallel_ar.text: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًۭا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ

claim_text: Jesus was praying to that person.

evidence.text: Thereupon Zechariah prayed to his Lord; he said, "My Lord, bestow on me good offspring from Your presence; You are the Hearer of Prayers."

parallel_ar.text: هُنَالِكَ دَعَا زَكَرِيَّا رَبَّهُۥ ۖ قَالَ رَبِّ هَبْ لِى مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةًۭ طَيِّبَةً ۖ إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ ٱلدُّعَآءِ

evidence.text: So woe to those who pray.

parallel_ar.text: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ

evidence.text: Then the angels called out to him, as he stood praying in the sanctuary: "God gives you good news of John; confirming a Word from God, and honorable, and moral, and a prophet; one of the upright."

parallel_ar.text: فَنَادَتْهُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَهُوَ قَآئِمٌۭ يُصَلِّى فِى ٱلْمِحْرَابِ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُبَشِّرُكَ بِيَحْيَىٰ مُصَدِّقًۢا بِكَلِمَةٍۢ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَسَيِّدًۭا وَحَصُورًۭا وَنَبِيًّۭا مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

claim_text: Praying to the Father is not an essential attribute.

evidence.text: O my son, observe the prayer, advocate righteousness, forbid evil, and be patient over what has befallen you. These are of the most honorable traits.

parallel_ar.text: يَٰبُنَىَّ أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأْمُرْ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَٱنْهَ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَكَ ۖ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ عَزْمِ ٱلْأُمُورِ

evidence.text: Except the prayerful.

parallel_ar.text: إِلَّا ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ

evidence.text: It is not fitting for the Most Merciful to have a son.

parallel_ar.text: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لِلرَّحْمَٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا

claim_text: Jesus doesn't need to pray.

evidence.text: A servant when he prays?

parallel_ar.text: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ

evidence.text: And mentions the name of his Lord, and prays.

parallel_ar.text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ

evidence.text: But the intercession of intercessors will not help them.

parallel_ar.text: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَٰعَةُ ٱلشَّٰفِعِينَ

claim_text: His human nature was praying.

evidence.text: The human being never tires of praying for good things; but when adversity afflicts him, he despairs and loses hope.

parallel_ar.text: لَّا يَسْـَٔمُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلْخَيْرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٌۭ قَنُوطٌۭ

evidence.text: The human being prays for evil as he prays for good. The human being is very hasty.

parallel_ar.text: وَيَدْعُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ بِٱلشَّرِّ دُعَآءَهُۥ بِٱلْخَيْرِ ۖ وَكَانَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ عَجُولًۭا

evidence.text: When We provide comfort for the human being, he withdraws and distances himself; but when adversity befalls him, he starts lengthy prayers.

parallel_ar.text: وَإِذَآ أَنْعَمْنَا عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَٰنِ أَعْرَضَ وَنَـَٔا بِجَانِبِهِۦ وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَذُو دُعَآءٍ عَرِيضٍۢ

claim_text: The fact that he prayed implies that he needs to pray.

evidence.text: He neither believed nor prayed.

parallel_ar.text: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ

evidence.text: So woe to those who pray.

parallel_ar.text: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ

evidence.text: Except the prayerful.

parallel_ar.text: إِلَّا ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ

claim_text: God wouldn't accept his prayers otherwise.

evidence.text: So do not pray to another god with God, else you will be of those tormented.

parallel_ar.text: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ

evidence.text: He neither believed nor prayed.

parallel_ar.text: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ

evidence.text: For he would not believe in God the Great.

parallel_ar.text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

claim_text: His prayers were accepted.

evidence.text: And mentions the name of his Lord, and prays.

parallel_ar.text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ

evidence.text: Return to your Lord, pleased and accepted.

parallel_ar.text: ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةًۭ مَّرْضِيَّةًۭ

evidence.text: He smiled and laughed at her words, and said, "My Lord, direct me to be thankful for the blessings you have bestowed upon me and upon my parents, and to do good works that please You. And admit me, by Your grace, into the company of Your virtuous servants."

parallel_ar.text: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكًۭا مِّن قَوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِىٓ أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَىَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَٰلِحًۭا تَرْضَىٰهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِى بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِى عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

claim_text: He was praying for the cup to be taken away.

evidence.text: And mentions the name of his Lord, and prays.

parallel_ar.text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ

evidence.text: A servant when he prays?

parallel_ar.text: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ

evidence.text: And I will withdraw from you, and from what you pray to instead of God. And I will pray to my Lord, and I hope I will not be disappointed in my prayer to my Lord."

parallel_ar.text: وَأَعْتَزِلُكُمْ وَمَا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّى شَقِيًّۭا

claim_text: Jesus' prayer gets rejected.

evidence.text: So woe to those who pray.

parallel_ar.text: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ

evidence.text: Say, "What are you to my Lord without your prayers? You have denied the truth, and the inevitable will happen."

parallel_ar.text: قُلْ مَا يَعْبَؤُا۟ بِكُمْ رَبِّى لَوْلَا دُعَآؤُكُمْ ۖ فَقَدْ كَذَّبْتُمْ فَسَوْفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامًۢا

evidence.text: And I will withdraw from you, and from what you pray to instead of God. And I will pray to my Lord, and I hope I will not be disappointed in my prayer to my Lord."

parallel_ar.text: وَأَعْتَزِلُكُمْ وَمَا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّى شَقِيًّۭا

claim_text: Human prayers can be rejected.

evidence.text: So woe to those who pray.

parallel_ar.text: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ

evidence.text: You are never to pray over anyone of them who dies, nor are you to stand at his graveside. They rejected God and His Messenger, and died while they were sinners.

parallel_ar.text: وَلَا تُصَلِّ عَلَىٰٓ أَحَدٍۢ مِّنْهُم مَّاتَ أَبَدًۭا وَلَا تَقُمْ عَلَىٰ قَبْرِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ فَٰسِقُونَ

evidence.text: If you pray to them, they cannot hear your prayer. And even if they heard, they would not answer you. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will reject your partnership. None informs you like an Expert.

parallel_ar.text: إِن تَدْعُوهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُوا۟ دُعَآءَكُمْ وَلَوْ سَمِعُوا۟ مَا ٱسْتَجَابُوا۟ لَكُمْ ۖ وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ يَكْفُرُونَ بِشِرْكِكُمْ ۚ وَلَا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثْلُ خَبِيرٍۢ

claim_text: Jesus' final plan was his death.

evidence.text: God said, "O Jesus, I am terminating your life, and raising you to Me, and clearing you of those who disbelieve. And I will make those who follow you superior to those who disbelieve, until the Day of Resurrection. Then to Me is your return; then I will judge between you regarding what you were disputing.

parallel_ar.text: إِذْ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ يَٰعِيسَىٰٓ إِنِّى مُتَوَفِّيكَ وَرَافِعُكَ إِلَىَّ وَمُطَهِّرُكَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَجَاعِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوكَ فَوْقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَىَّ مَرْجِعُكُمْ فَأَحْكُمُ بَيْنَكُمْ فِيمَا كُنتُمْ فِيهِ تَخْتَلِفُونَ

evidence.text: Those before them planned, but the entire plan is up to God. He knows what every soul earns. Those who disbelieve will know to whom the Ultimate Home is.

parallel_ar.text: وَقَدْ مَكَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْمَكْرُ جَمِيعًۭا ۖ يَعْلَمُ مَا تَكْسِبُ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ ٱلْكُفَّٰرُ لِمَنْ عُقْبَى ٱلدَّارِ

evidence.text: To your Lord is its finality.

parallel_ar.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ

claim_text: He voluntarily gave himself as the atonement.

evidence.text: He said, "My Lord, I have wronged myself, so forgive me." So He forgave him. He is the Forgiver, the Merciful.

parallel_ar.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى فَٱغْفِرْ لِى فَغَفَرَ لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

evidence.text: "This is what you were promised-for every careful penitent.

parallel_ar.text: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍۢ

evidence.text: And We redeemed him with a great sacrifice.

parallel_ar.text: وَفَدَيْنَٰهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍۢ

claim_text: He asked for the pain to be taken away.

evidence.text: "Our Lord, lift the torment from us, we are believers."

parallel_ar.text: رَّبَّنَا ٱكْشِفْ عَنَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ

evidence.text: He said, "My Lord, put my heart at peace for me.

parallel_ar.text: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱشْرَحْ لِى صَدْرِى

evidence.text: He said, "I will ask my Lord to forgive you. He is the Forgiver, the Most Merciful."

parallel_ar.text: قَالَ سَوْفَ أَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكُمْ رَبِّىٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

claim_text: The fear of death is pain.

evidence.text: "That you shall worship none but God. I fear for you the agony of a painful Day."

parallel_ar.text: أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ أَلِيمٍۢ

evidence.text: And that My punishment is the painful punishment.

parallel_ar.text: وَأَنَّ عَذَابِى هُوَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ٱلْأَلِيمُ

evidence.text: The daze of death has come in truth: "This is what you tried to evade."

parallel_ar.text: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ

claim_text: He was in fear of death.

evidence.text: The daze of death has come in truth: "This is what you tried to evade."

parallel_ar.text: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ

evidence.text: He will guzzle it, but he will not swallow it. Death will come at him from every direction, but he will not die. And beyond this is relentless suffering.

parallel_ar.text: يَتَجَرَّعُهُۥ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُسِيغُهُۥ وَيَأْتِيهِ ٱلْمَوْتُ مِن كُلِّ مَكَانٍۢ وَمَا هُوَ بِمَيِّتٍۢ ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِۦ عَذَابٌ غَلِيظٌۭ

evidence.text: So he left, fearful and vigilant. He said, "My Lord, deliver me from the wrongdoing people."

parallel_ar.text: فَخَرَجَ مِنْهَا خَآئِفًۭا يَتَرَقَّبُ ۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِى مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

claim_text: His human nature...

evidence.text: The human being is in loss.

parallel_ar.text: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ

evidence.text: We created the human being, and We know what his soul whispers to him. We are nearer to him than his jugular vein.

parallel_ar.text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ

evidence.text: Or is the human being to have whatever he desires?

parallel_ar.text: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَٰنِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ

claim_text: Jesus has two natures: divine and human.

evidence.text: That is Jesus son of Mary-the Word of truth about which they doubt.

parallel_ar.text: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ ۚ قَوْلَ ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ

evidence.text: The likeness of Jesus in God's sight is that of Adam: He created him from dust, then said to him, "Be," and he was.

parallel_ar.text: إِنَّ مَثَلَ عِيسَىٰ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ ءَادَمَ ۖ خَلَقَهُۥ مِن تُرَابٍۢ ثُمَّ قَالَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

parallel_ar.text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَأَنَّ مَا يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ هُوَ ٱلْبَٰطِلُ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْكَبِيرُ

claim_text: The soul can live on after the death of the flesh.

evidence.text: No soul can die except by God's leave, at a predetermined time. Whoever desires the reward of the world, We will give him some of it; and whoever desires the reward of the Hereafter, We will give him some of it; and We will reward the appreciative.

parallel_ar.text: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفْسٍ أَن تَمُوتَ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ كِتَٰبًۭا مُّؤَجَّلًۭا ۗ وَمَن يُرِدْ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنْيَا نُؤْتِهِۦ مِنْهَا وَمَن يُرِدْ ثَوَابَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ نُؤْتِهِۦ مِنْهَا ۚ وَسَنَجْزِى ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

evidence.text: God takes the souls at the time of their death, and those that have not died during their sleep. He retains those for which He has decreed death, and He releases the others until a predetermined time. In that are signs for people who reflect.

parallel_ar.text: ٱللَّهُ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلْأَنفُسَ حِينَ مَوْتِهَا وَٱلَّتِى لَمْ تَمُتْ فِى مَنَامِهَا ۖ فَيُمْسِكُ ٱلَّتِى قَضَىٰ عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ وَيُرْسِلُ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَٰتٍۢ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

evidence.text: Every soul will taste death. Then to Us you will be returned.

parallel_ar.text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْنَا تُرْجَعُونَ

claim_text: Jesus possesses human nature.

evidence.text: God intends to lighten your burden, for the human being was created weak.

parallel_ar.text: يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُخَفِّفَ عَنكُمْ ۚ وَخُلِقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ ضَعِيفًۭا

evidence.text: Or is the human being to have whatever he desires?

parallel_ar.text: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَٰنِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ

evidence.text: Does the human being not consider that We created him from a seed? Yet he becomes a fierce adversary.

parallel_ar.text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍۢ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ

claim_text: Jesus is human nature.

evidence.text: The likeness of Jesus in God's sight is that of Adam: He created him from dust, then said to him, "Be," and he was.

parallel_ar.text: إِنَّ مَثَلَ عِيسَىٰ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ ءَادَمَ ۖ خَلَقَهُۥ مِن تُرَابٍۢ ثُمَّ قَالَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

evidence.text: God intends to lighten your burden, for the human being was created weak.

parallel_ar.text: يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُخَفِّفَ عَنكُمْ ۚ وَخُلِقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ ضَعِيفًۭا

evidence.text: Or is the human being to have whatever he desires?

parallel_ar.text: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَٰنِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ

claim_text: His divine nature doesn't need to die.

evidence.text: God is He who created you, then provides for you, then makes you die, then brings you back to life. Can any of your idols do any of that? Glorified is He, and Exalted above what they associate.

parallel_ar.text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ ثُمَّ رَزَقَكُمْ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُحْيِيكُمْ ۖ هَلْ مِن شُرَكَآئِكُم مَّن يَفْعَلُ مِن ذَٰلِكُم مِّن شَىْءٍۢ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

evidence.text: Their Lord's punishment is not to be taken for granted.

parallel_ar.text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍۢ

evidence.text: Had these been gods, they would not have descended into it. All will abide in it.

parallel_ar.text: لَوْ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةًۭ مَّا وَرَدُوهَا ۖ وَكُلٌّۭ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

claim_text: Your essence is immortal.

evidence.text: Alas, you love the fleeting life.

parallel_ar.text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ

evidence.text: Every soul will taste death. Then to Us you will be returned.

parallel_ar.text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْنَا تُرْجَعُونَ

evidence.text: Thinking that his wealth has made him immortal.

parallel_ar.text: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ

claim_text: In 1 Timothy 6 verse 16, it says he alone is immortal.

evidence.text: Thinking that his wealth has made him immortal.

parallel_ar.text: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ

evidence.text: Or have they adopted protectors besides him? But God is the Protector, and He gives life to the dead, and He has power over all things.

parallel_ar.text: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ ۖ فَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلْوَلِىُّ وَهُوَ يُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ

evidence.text: We did not grant immortality to any human being before you. Should you die, are they then the immortal?

parallel_ar.text: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا لِبَشَرٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِكَ ٱلْخُلْدَ ۖ أَفَإِي۟ن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلْخَٰلِدُونَ

claim_text: Nobody else can be immortal except him in the essence.

evidence.text: None can grasp it except the purified.

parallel_ar.text: لَّا يَمَسُّهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلْمُطَهَّرُونَ

evidence.text: None besides God can unveil it.

parallel_ar.text: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

evidence.text: Whom no human has touched before, nor jinn.

parallel_ar.text: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌۭ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّۭ

claim_text: We don't have divine essence.

evidence.text: We have created them of special creation.

parallel_ar.text: إِنَّآ أَنشَأْنَٰهُنَّ إِنشَآءًۭ

evidence.text: Did We not create you from an insignificant fluid?

parallel_ar.text: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٍۢ مَّهِينٍۢ

evidence.text: Did We not destroy the ancients?

parallel_ar.text: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

claim_text: My essence is immortal.

evidence.text: Every soul will taste death. Then to Us you will be returned.

parallel_ar.text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْنَا تُرْجَعُونَ

evidence.text: Thinking that his wealth has made him immortal.

parallel_ar.text: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ

evidence.text: There is no soul without a Protector over it.

parallel_ar.text: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌۭ

claim_text: His divine essence is immortal.

evidence.text: Dwelling therein forever. The promise of God is true. He is the Mighty, the Wise.

parallel_ar.text: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّۭا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ

evidence.text: But will remain the Presence of your Lord, Full of Majesty and Splendor.

parallel_ar.text: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ

evidence.text: And Exalted is the Grandeur of our Lord-He never had a mate, nor a child.

parallel_ar.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةًۭ وَلَا وَلَدًۭا

claim_text: No man shall see the divine essence.

evidence.text: None besides God can unveil it.

parallel_ar.text: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

evidence.text: It is not for any human that God should speak to him, except by inspiration, or from behind a veil, or by sending a messenger to reveal by His permission whatever He wills. He is All-High, All-Wise.

parallel_ar.text: ۞ وَمَا كَانَ لِبَشَرٍ أَن يُكَلِّمَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا وَحْيًا أَوْ مِن وَرَآئِ حِجَابٍ أَوْ يُرْسِلَ رَسُولًۭا فَيُوحِىَ بِإِذْنِهِۦ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِىٌّ حَكِيمٌۭ

evidence.text: None can grasp it except the purified.

parallel_ar.text: لَّا يَمَسُّهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلْمُطَهَّرُونَ

claim_text: He alone describes the divine essence.

evidence.text: Say, "He is God, the One.

parallel_ar.text: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ

evidence.text: Would He not know, He Who created? He is the Refined, the Expert.

parallel_ar.text: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ

evidence.text: Surely your god is God, the One besides whom there is no other god. He comprehends everything in knowledge.

parallel_ar.text: إِنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عِلْمًۭا

claim_text: Only he is immortal and no one shall see him.

evidence.text: He will guzzle it, but he will not swallow it. Death will come at him from every direction, but he will not die. And beyond this is relentless suffering.

parallel_ar.text: يَتَجَرَّعُهُۥ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُسِيغُهُۥ وَيَأْتِيهِ ٱلْمَوْتُ مِن كُلِّ مَكَانٍۢ وَمَا هُوَ بِمَيِّتٍۢ ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِۦ عَذَابٌ غَلِيظٌۭ

evidence.text: Does he think that no one sees him?

parallel_ar.text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ

evidence.text: We did not grant immortality to any human being before you. Should you die, are they then the immortal?

parallel_ar.text: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا لِبَشَرٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِكَ ٱلْخُلْدَ ۖ أَفَإِي۟ن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلْخَٰلِدُونَ

claim_text: The divine essence has not been seen by people.

evidence.text: Whom no human has touched before, nor jinn.

parallel_ar.text: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌۭ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّۭ

evidence.text: Do they not reflect within themselves? God did not create the heavens and the earth, and what is between them, except with reason, and for a specific duration. But most people, regarding meeting their Lord, are disbelievers.

parallel_ar.text: أَوَلَمْ يَتَفَكَّرُوا۟ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِم ۗ مَّا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّۭى ۗ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِلِقَآئِ رَبِّهِمْ لَكَٰفِرُونَ

evidence.text: None besides God can unveil it.

parallel_ar.text: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

claim_text: Jesus' human nature did not carry the divine essence.

evidence.text: The likeness of Jesus in God's sight is that of Adam: He created him from dust, then said to him, "Be," and he was.

parallel_ar.text: إِنَّ مَثَلَ عِيسَىٰ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ ءَادَمَ ۖ خَلَقَهُۥ مِن تُرَابٍۢ ثُمَّ قَالَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

evidence.text: I did not create the jinn and the humans except to worship Me.

parallel_ar.text: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ

evidence.text: He created the human being from a drop of fluid, yet he becomes an open adversary.

parallel_ar.text: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍۢ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ

claim_text: The human nature and divine nature of Jesus are distinct.

evidence.text: Your creation and your resurrection are only as a single soul. God is Hearing and Seeing.

parallel_ar.text: مَّا خَلْقُكُمْ وَلَا بَعْثُكُمْ إِلَّا كَنَفْسٍۢ وَٰحِدَةٍ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۢ بَصِيرٌ

evidence.text: He created the human being from a drop of fluid, yet he becomes an open adversary.

parallel_ar.text: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍۢ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ

evidence.text: That is Jesus son of Mary-the Word of truth about which they doubt.

parallel_ar.text: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ ۚ قَوْلَ ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ

claim_text: The divine essence is immortal.

evidence.text: Dwelling therein forever. The promise of God is true. He is the Mighty, the Wise.

parallel_ar.text: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّۭا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ

evidence.text: God, the Absolute.

parallel_ar.text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ

evidence.text: But will remain the Presence of your Lord, Full of Majesty and Splendor.

parallel_ar.text: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ

claim_text: Immortal essence can only belong to God.

evidence.text: Your creation and your resurrection are only as a single soul. God is Hearing and Seeing.

parallel_ar.text: مَّا خَلْقُكُمْ وَلَا بَعْثُكُمْ إِلَّا كَنَفْسٍۢ وَٰحِدَةٍ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۢ بَصِيرٌ

evidence.text: To God belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and to God is the ultimate return.

parallel_ar.text: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ

evidence.text: God, there is no god but He, the Living, the Eternal.

parallel_ar.text: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْحَىُّ ٱلْقَيُّومُ

claim_text: Immortal essence can belong to humans as well.

evidence.text: For the living and the dead?

parallel_ar.text: أَحْيَآءًۭ وَأَمْوَٰتًۭا

evidence.text: Thinking that his wealth has made him immortal.

parallel_ar.text: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ

evidence.text: Or have they taken to themselves gods from the earth who resurrect?

parallel_ar.text: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَةًۭ مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ هُمْ يُنشِرُونَ
